text: Ricardo Mórtola Di Puglia (c. 1950 - 22 April 2014) was an Ecuadorian architect and businessman. He was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. He was known for constructing Estadio Monumental Isidro Romero Carbo in Barcelona. He won many awards during his twenty-year career. Mórtola died in Guayaquil, Ecuador from respiratory arrest caused by testicular cancer, aged 63. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Ecuadorian architects Category:Deaths from testicular cancer Category:Deaths from respiratory arrest Category:Disease-related deaths in Ecuador Category:Businesspeople from Guayaquil
